Allows you to specify the style and templates to customize the appearance.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Provides a template to display instead of unsupported custom items.

DashboardControl’s base class. Provides access to styles, print options and end-user restrictions.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWpf.DashboardControlBase.ActualMaximizedDashboardItemVisibility

summary.para: Indicates whether a dashboard displays a maximized item.

member.value: The value if the dashboard displays a maximized item.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWpf.DashboardControlBase.AllowInspectAggregatedData

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to display aggregated data in the Data Inspector.

member.value: true, to display aggregated data in the Data Inspector; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWpf.DashboardControlBase.AllowMaximizeDashboardItems

summary.para: Gets or sets whether an end-user can maximize an item.

member.value: True to show the Maximize button and allow the end-user to maximize an item; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWpf.DashboardControlBase.AllowPrintDashboard

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the end-user can print or export a dashboard.

member.value: True to show the Export To button and allow the end-user to print or export the dashboard; otherwise, false.

Contains a class with a collection of commands used in the Dashboard Control.
A collection of commands used in the .
The Clear Master Filter button in the dashboard item caption.
The dashboard item’s context menu.
The Custom Period… command in the item’s context menu.
The Inspect Data button in the dashboard item’s caption and context menu.
The Drill Up button in the dashboard item’s caption and context menu.
A button in the dashboard item caption that shows a list of tab pages.
The Export To command in the dashboard item’s context menu.
The Print Preview command in the dashboard item’s context menu that opens a preview for the entire dashboard.
The Export To Excel command in the dashboard item’s context menu that exports data of the entire dashboard.
The Export To Image command in the dashboard item’s context menu that exports data of the entire dashboard.
The Export To PDF command in the dashboard item’s context menu that exports data of the entire dashboard.
The Print Preview button in the dashboard item’s caption and context menu that opens a preview for a specific dashboard item.
The Export To button in the dashboard item caption that exports data of a specific dashboard item.

The Multi-Select button in the dashboard item caption.
A scroll button in the dashboard item caption that scrolls tab headers to the last tab.
A scroll button in the dashboard item caption that scrolls tab headers to the first tab.
the Select Date Time Periods button in the Range Filter dashboard item’s caption and context menu.
